name: Fatal Maze 0.2 by Cocell and GameRickster
name_original: Fatal Maze 0.2 by Cocell and GameRickster
description:
Fatal Maze How to play.  You are an electron and have to avoid the walls and get to main CPU to score points, you can also touch the tips of some walls for points and light.

Controls: WASD
Space: Jump
ALT + F4 : quit game
